item.title: My Apple Event predictions
item.description:
Tomorrow Apple is holding an event to announce new products for the Mac. What will be announced is anyone's guess, but here's what my intuition is telling me:

  1. A new MacBook Air is pretty much a given. The rumors are pretty strong that there will be an 11.6" and …
item.dc:creator: mr.rcollins

item.title: HIW (How I Work): The Apple MacBook
item.description:
I am asked quite often how I can keep up with everything in regards to educational technology, software, and hardware. After some reflection, I realized that it would make a good series of articles, so I'm going to write up How I Work.

First up is probably the most important …
